title: "How do we get AI out of the early adopter phase? It's about people"
excerpt: "For those companies that are still kicking the tires on AI, it's natural that cultural antibodies would fight against it. It's new and (as yet) unproven. As it gets implemented in production, however, people start to see the value and the antibodies dissipate, as can be seen in the vastly diminished cultural headwinds for those companies that ..."
